function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High prevalence of chronic conditions in informal settlements","Impact":"Increased risk of severe COVID-19 cases and other contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Improving healthcare access and quality, promoting healthy lifestyle behaviors","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile health clinics, public health education tools","People":"Residents of informal settlements","Owner":"Local governments, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Poorly documented disease burdens and reliance on informal healthcare providers","Impact":"Limited understanding of disease trends and inadequate public health response","Mitigation":"Investing in healthcare infrastructure, improving data collection and reporting","Technologies":"Health information systems, data analytics, telemedicine","People":"Residents of informal settlements, public health professionals","Owner":"Local governments, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Environmental factors increasing the risk of respiratory diseases","Impact":"Higher incidence of respiratory diseases in informal settlements","Mitigation":"Improving indoor and outdoor air quality, regulating waste burning and cooking practices","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, clean cookstoves, waste management technologies","People":"Residents of informal settlements","Owner":"Local governments, environmental protection agencies"}]}
